name: Dr. Amit Kumar
bio: Dr. Amit Kumar is a highly experienced General Medicine specialist with over 10 years of experience in treating a variety of health conditions.

name: Dr. Sunita Sharma
bio: Dr. Sunita Sharma is a compassionate pediatrician with a focus on children's health and wellness, dedicated to providing personalized care.

name: Dr. Rajiv Mehta
bio: Dr. Rajiv Mehta is a well-known orthopedic surgeon specializing in musculoskeletal injuries and surgeries, with years of expertise in his field.
